name: Dawn of Gray
description:
Dawn of Gray is a single-player visual novel with a distinctive style, in which you play the role of a young man discovering himself and his feelings.

More of a narrative essay than a video game, this project is a proposal for the more or less difficult experiences we can go through.

The 3 stories told will introduce you to a different character each time, with his or her own story.

Trailer music credit:
Pillow Fort by Purrple Cat | https://purrplecat.com/
